All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AllColorChoicesSettledEvent
This event is emitted when all players have chosen their color and there are no equal preferences.
AllPlayersChoseStartingCardSideEvent
This event is emitted when all players have chosen the side of the starting card.
AllPlayersJoinedEvent
This event is emitted when the maximum capacity of the game is reached or when an early start is requested by players.
AlreadyClosedException
Exception thrown when a message is transmitted to a Receiver that has already been closed.
Ansi
Utility class for generating ANSI escape codes.
AuthController
The main controller for the scene associated to this ClientState: ClientState.NOT_AUTHENTICATED
AuthenticateC2S
This message is used to authenticate a player, allowing the user to specify a nickname (unique).
AuthenticateCommand
This command allows players to authenticate with the server, entering a nickname.
AuthScene
This scene permits players to authenticate with the server.
BackCardFace
The back face of a card.
BaseCardFace
Represent the face of Card on which are placed all the components, (i.e.

Base class for layouts.

Base class for RMI connections.

Base class for TCP connections.
BaseTuiView
Base class that contains the logic for rendering the TUI.
Board
The board game, shared among all players.
BoardSerDes
GSON serializer and deserializer for Board
Border
Adds a border around its child component.
BroadcastMessage
A Message for every PlayerProfile connected to the game
BroadcastMessageSentS2C
This message is used to inform the player that the BroadcastMessage has been sent.
C2SNetworkMessage
Interface for all the messages that can be sent from the client to the server.
Card
Card represents placeable card of the game (which are allocated into PlayArea).
CardColor
CardColor represents all possible colors of placeable card.
CardController
The base controller for a card.
CardDrawnFromDeckEvent
This event is emitted after a user draws a card from decks.
CardDrawnFromEmptySourceEvent
This event is emitted after a user tries to draw from an empty source.
CardFace
This interface defines all the methods for BaseCardFace.
CardFaceComponent
A component that renders a card face.
CardNotInHandException
This exception is thrown when a player tries to place a card that is not in his hand.
CardPlacedEvent
This event is emitted after a user has placed a card on his PlayArea (resource, golden or starting card).
CardPlacementController
The controller for a card placement.
CardSelectedEvent
 
Centered
Centers its child component on the horizontal, vertical, or both axes.
ChangeFocusedPlayerCommand
This command allows players to change the play area displayed in the scene PlayAreaScene.
ChatBox
Component that contains the chat messages.
ChatBox.ChatScrollable
 
ChatBoxController
The controller for the chat It has methods for sending and showing new messages
ChatEvent
This interface represents a generic event related to the chat feature.
ChatManager
The handler of the chat, allowing to send a message and view the MailBox of a specific PlayerProfile
ChatMessage
Component that contains a chat message.
ChatMessageController
The controller for the message component
ChatMessageSerDes
GSON serializer and deserializer for Message

RMI connection on the client side.
ClientState
 
ClientTCPConnection
TCP connection on the client side.

Exception thrown when an error occurs while closing a connection.
Collectible
Something that the player can collect.
CollectibleDeserializer
GSON deserializer for Collectible
ColorChoiceController
The controller for the component used to show the PlayerColor chosen by the players
Column
A layout that arranges its children in a column.
CommandBuilder
A builder that, in conjunction with SequenceBuilder is used to build a command tree.
CommandContext
A context that is used during command parsing and execution.
CommandNode
A node in the command tree.
CommandNode.Result
A result of the parsing.
CommonPoolSelectionStrategy<O,I>
With this strategy, all choosers choose from the same pool.
Component
A component is a part of the TUI (Terminal User Interface).
ComponentController
The main controller for a component.
Composition
A composition is a tree of components that is treated as a single component.
ConnectCommand
This command allows to connect to the server by entering network params (protocol, hostname and port).
Connection<S,R>
A connection to a remote host.
ConnectionController
The main controller for the scene associated to this ClientState: ClientState.NOT_CONNECTED
ConnectionLostEvent
 
ConnectionWrapper
The main purpose is to receive network messages from the server.
Constants
Utility class containing the common constants needed to: Show cards images Place cards in the playarea Handle connection
Constraint
Represents a constraint for the dimensions of a Component.
Controller
The main controller
Corner
A corner in a BaseCardFace.
CornerCoverPoints
CornerCoverPoints is a type of Points that gives an amount of points per every corner covered by placing the card
CornerDeserializer
GSON deserializer for Corner
CornerPosition
Corner positions.
CreateGameAndJoinC2S
This message is used to create a new game.
CreateGameCommand
This command allows players to create a game.
Cursor
Places the terminal cursor at the position where this component is rendered.
Deck
Represents an ordered deck of Cards
DeckLocation
Represents the two possible decks from which the player can draw a card
DeckSourceController
The controller for a deck source
DifferentCollectibleObjective
An objective whose requirements are to have a minimum number of a certain set of Items
Dimensions
Represents the dimensions of something that ha a rectangular shape
DirectMessage
A Message for a specific PlayerProfile connected to the game
DirectMessageSentS2C
This message is used to inform the player that the DirectMessage has been sent.
DisjointSelectionStrategy<O,I>
With this strategy, every chooser chooses from a different pool.
DoubleChoiceException
 
DoubleChoiceS2C
This message is sent to the player when he tries to choose the secret objective more than once.
DoubleSideChoiceS2C
This message is sent to the player when he tries to choose the starting card side more than once.
DrawArea
A drawing area on a DrawBuffer.
DrawArea.Point
A point in a 2D space.
DrawArea.Rectangle
A rectangle in a 2D space.
DrawBuffer
A buffer to draw on.
DrawCardCommand
This command allows to draw a card from a DrawSource.
DrawCardFromDeckC2S
This message is used to draw a card from the specified deck type.
DrawCardFromFaceUpCardsC2S
This message is used to draw a specified FaceUpCard.
DrawResult
DrawResult represents all possible outcomes of a card draw
DrawSource
DrawSource represents a source from where drawing cards.
Element
An element is a component that does not contain other components and has a fixed preferred size.
EmptyDeckPlaceholderComponent
A placeholder component that is displayed when the deck is empty instead of the top card.
EmptySourceS2C
This message is sent to the player when he tries to draw a card from an empty DrawSource.
EndingController
The main controller for the scene associated to these GameStatus and ClientState: GameStatus.FINISHED ClientState.IN_GAME
EndingPlayerController
The controller for the component that shows a player, along his or her information, in the final ranking
EndingScene
This scene shows the finals scores.
EnumParser<E>
A parser that reads a string representing an enum instance and then puts it in the CommandContext.
Event
Interface that marks an event class.
EventEmitter<E>
An object that emits events.
EventEmitter.Registration
A registration is returned by EventEmitter.onAny(EventListener) and EventEmitter.on(Class, EventListener) and can be used to stop listening to events.
EventEmitterImpl<E>
An implementation of EventEmitter that other classes can delegate to.
EventListener<E>
A listener is an object that can receive events emitted by an EventEmitter.
ExitFinishedGameCommand
This command allows players to leave the EndingScene and turn back to the GamesListScene.
FaceUpCard
Represents a slot that contains a completely visible Card and that replenish itself from source "mainSource" when drawn.
FaceUpCardReplacedEvent
This event is emitted after a user has drawn a FaceUpCard.
FaceUpSourceController
The controller for a face up card.
Flex
A layout that arranges its children in a row or column and allows for "flexible" children.
Flex.Direction
 
FlexChild
A child of a Flex layout.
FlexChild.Fixed
A fixed child of a Flex layout.
FlexChild.Flexible
A flexible child of a Flex layout.
FrontCardFace
The front face of a card.
Game
It manages an entire game: from player joining to decreeing winners.
GameAbortedEvent
This event is emitted when there is only one player connected.
GameAlreadyStartedS2C
This message is used to inform the player that the specified Game has already started.
GameAssets
Provides predetermined lists of Objective and Card divided by type.
GameClosedEvent
This event is emitted when a game ends.
GameController
The controller for the component that shows a game and: The game id The maximum number of player for this game The number of the player currently connected to the game in the list of join-able games
GameCreatedEvent
This event is emitted when a game is created.
GameCreationPopupController
The controller for the popup responsible for choosing the maximum number of players allowed in the game
GameDeletedEvent
This event is emitted when a game has been deleted by the GameManager class.
GameEvent
This interface represents a generic event related to a specific Game.
GameFinishedEvent
This event is emitted when a game ends normally or when it ends due to player disconnections (only one player connected).
GameFinishedS2C
This message allows players to receive the final scores of the game, once it has ended.
GameJoinedS2C
This message tells player that he has joined a game.
GameListChangedEvent
 
GameListController
The main controller for the scene associated to this ClientState: ClientState.AUTHENTICATED
GameManager
Manages multiple Game instances at once and allows to save the current status in a json file
GameManagerEvent
This interface represents a generic event related to the GameManager.
GameNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when actions are performed on a non-existent game.
GameNotFoundS2C
This message tells the player that the specified game id is incorrect (there are no games with that id).
GamePausedEvent
 
GamePausedEvent
This event is emitted when a game is paused (SUSPENDED) by the server.
GameResumedEvent
 
GameResumedEvent
This event is emitted when a game is resumed by the server.
GameResumedS2C
This message notifies players that the game has been resumed.
GamesListScene
This scene shows the list of available games.
GameStartedEvent
This event is emitted when a game starts (transit to SETUP_STARTING_CARD_SIDE status).
GameStatus
GameStatus represents all possible macro-phases of a Game.
GraphicalRendition
Represents the set of all graphical rendition properties.
GraphicalRenditionProperty
Represents a graphical rendition property.
GraphicalRenditionProperty.BackgroundColor
Represents the background color of the text.
GraphicalRenditionProperty.ForegroundColor
Represents the foreground color of the text.
GraphicalRenditionProperty.Italics
Represents whether the text is in italics.
GraphicalRenditionProperty.Underline
Represents whether the text is underlined.
GraphicalRenditionProperty.Weight
Represents the weight of the text.
GreedyTextArgumentParser
A parser that greedily matches the entire input and puts it in the CommandContext under the given name.
GUIClient
 
GUIElement
The common interface for components and scenes
GUIView
The specific class for the graphical user interface.
HandCardController
The controller for a hand card.
HandChangedEvent
This event is emitted when a player draws or places a card (hand changes).
IDCardSerDes
GSON serializer and deserializer for Card that uses the card's ID
IDObjectiveSerDes
GSON serializer and deserializer for Objective that uses the objective's ID
IllegalGameStateException
This exception is thrown when actions are performed during wrong GameStatus.
IllegalMoveException
This exception is thrown when a client tries to perform illegal actions during game.
IllegalPlacementException
 
IllegalTurnException
This exception is thrown when a player tries to perform an action not during his turn.
IntParser
A parser that reads an integer and then puts it in the CommandContext.
InvalidCardException
This exception is thrown when a player specifies an invalid card in the command that he want to execute.
InvalidCardS2C
This message notifies the player that the id of the specified card is incorrect.
InvalidMaxPlayersException
 
InvalidMaxPlayersS2C
This message tells the player that the specified maximum threshold (maxPlayers) is not valid.
InvalidObjectiveException
This exception is thrown when a player specifies an invalid or nonexistent Objective.
InvalidObjectiveSelectionS2C
This message tells the player that the chosen secret Objective is not valid.
InvalidPlacementEvent
 
InvalidPlacementS2C
This message tells the player that the card placement is not valid.
InvalidRecipientException
 
InvalidRecipientS2C
This message tells the player that the recipient he specified is invalid (recipient is not in the same game as the sender).
Item
An item.
ItemPoints
ItemPoints is type of Points that gives a score for a card placement based on the amount of a specific item
JoinCommand
This command allows players to join a game.
JoinGameC2S
This message is used to join a Game that has not yet started.

Line
A utility class to draw lines on a DrawArea.
Line.Style
A style to use for drawing lines.

A terminal implementation for Linux systems.

A parser that matches a literal string.

This exception is thrown when there are not enough game resources (cards or objectives).
NotEnoughPlayersException
 
NotEnoughPlayersS2C
This message tells the player that the game cannot resume/start since there are not enough players connected.
NotUndoableOperationException
This exception is thrown when an undo is requested on a PlayArea and the only one card placed is the starting card.

Paragraph
Renders a paragraph of text.

An exception thrown when a parser fails to parse a command, or when a completion is not possible.
Parser
A parser for a command token.

Represent a completion for a partial token.

Represent the result of parsing a token.

This event is emitted when a player disconnects from a game.
PlayerDisconnectedS2C
This message tells all players in game that a user has logged out.

This event is emitted by the Game class when a player joins a game.
PlayerJoinedInGameEvent
This event is emitted by the GameManager class when a player joins a game.
PlayerKickedEvent
This event is emitted by the Game class after a player disconnection.
PlayerLeftEvent
This event is emitted by the Game class when a player disconnects from a game during the following stages: AWAITING_PLAYERS SETUP_STARTING_CARD_SIDE SETUP_COLOR SETUP_OBJECTIVE. The player will no longer be part of the match.
PlayerLeftFromGameEvent
This event is emitted by the GameManager class when a player disconnects from a Game.

PlayerManager

SelectionPhaseStrategy<O,I>

VirtualView
This class handles NetworkMessage between client and server: send message to the client when events are emitted; receive client message and manage them by calling Controller, PlayerManager and GameManager classes. To each player is associated an instance of this class.
